name: BeeBee
description:
BeeBee is a 2D Bullet-Hell that was made in 5 days. The theme of the game is extinction. The player takes on the role of BeeBee, a giant bee fighting to protect its hive. The game features power-ups to aid the player in combat as well as difficulty that ramps up over time.

BeeBee was made in the Unity engine as a part of a team. Similar to a game jam, each team had 5 days to create a game based around the theme 'Extinction'. Due to the time sensitive nature of the project, our team decided to make a 2D game as we felt we would be able to do more with the project.

The game is score-driven, encouraging the player to keep playing to beat their previous score. As the game progresses the quantity and types of enemies change to increase difficulty.
